main event: A civilian witness observed a UFO over Lewisburg, Ohio, on May 18, 1965, reporting a sighting lasting approximately 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as being about the size of a car and emitting a bright light., The object was seen moving swiftly and suddenly disappearing before reappearing moments later., It reportedly made a running noise during the observation., The witness's sister was also present and confirmed the sighting., The sky was clear, and the observation occurred in daylight.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: a civilian who reported the sighting along with her sister
